pages.index: LiftPro - Forklift Rental and Services in India Home Prices Solutions Services Contact us Top-Quality Forklift Rentals and Services View Our Prices Our Solutions Tailored to You Flexible Forklift Rentals Expert Maintenance Services Custom Solutions Why Choose Us? At LiftPro, we are committed to providing the best forklift rental and service solutions to meet your business needs. Our dedication to quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction sets us apart in the industry. We offer a comprehensive range of services, including flexible rental options, expert maintenance, and customized solutions tailored specifically for your operational requirements. Wide selection of high-quality forklifts for every application Flexible rental terms to suit your project needs Expert maintenance and repair services to keep your equipment in top condition Personalized service with a focus on your unique business challenges Competitive pricing with transparent and straightforward terms 24/7 customer support to assist you whenever you need View Our Prices Our Comprehensive Services Forklift Rentals Choose from a variety of high-quality forklifts suited to your specific needs, whether for short-term or long-term projects. Maintenance & Repairs Keep your equipment in top condition with our expert maintenance and repair services. We offer regular servicing and emergency repairs. Custom Solutions We provide tailored forklift solutions designed to address the unique challenges of your business operations. Scheduled Service Benefit from our scheduled service plans to ensure your forklifts are always ready for use and operating efficiently. Performance Monitoring Utilize our advanced monitoring services to track the performance of your equipment and optimize its usage for better productivity. Safety Inspections Ensure the safety of your operations with our thorough safety inspections and compliance checks for all your forklift equipment. Get in Touch We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our forklift rentals, need assistance with our services, or want to discuss a custom solution for your business, feel free to reach out to us. Our team is here to provide support and ensure you get the best possible service. Contact us through the form below or give us a call, and we will get back to you as soon as possible. pages.prices: LiftPro - Forklift Rental and Services in India | rental pricing Home Prices Solutions Services Contact us Prices Basic Plan Ideal for small projects or short-term rentals. 1-2 Ton Forklift Daily Rental Standard Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹5,000 per day Book Now Standard Plan Perfect for medium-sized projects with longer-term needs. 2-5 Ton Forklift Weekly Rental Comprehensive Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹20,000 per week Book Now Premium Plan Best for large projects requiring extensive support and services. 5-10 Ton Forklift Monthly Rental Premium Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹75,000 per month Book Now Extended Plan For long-term projects with additional flexibility and support. 10-15 Ton Forklift Quarterly Rental Extended Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹2,00,000 per quarter Book Now Corporate Plan Customized plan for large-scale corporate needs with tailored services. 15+ Ton Forklift Annual Rental Priority Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹6,00,000 per year Book Now Special Event Plan Designed for special events and short-term high-demand periods. Any Forklift Type Event-Based Rental On-Demand Maintenance 24/7 Customer Support Insurance Included ₹10,000 per day Book Now Rental Terms and Conditions General Terms At LiftPro, we strive to make your forklift rental experience as smooth and hassle-free as possible. Our rental agreements are designed to be flexible and cater to your specific needs. Rentals are available for daily, weekly, and monthly durations, allowing you to select the most suitable option based on your project's requirements. All rentals include standard insurance coverage and maintenance services to ensure your equipment remains in excellent working condition throughout the rental period. To initiate a rental, a security deposit is required, which will be refunded upon the safe return of the equipment. A valid identification and proof of address are necessary to complete the rental agreement. For corporate clients or long-term rentals, we offer customized contracts and pricing options tailored to your business needs. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service, ensuring that any issues or concerns are addressed promptly and efficiently. All equipment must be returned in the same condition as it was received. Any damages or excessive wear and tear will be assessed and may incur additional charges. We also provide an option for extended rentals if your project timeline changes, allowing you to seamlessly continue using the equipment without interruptions. For your convenience, our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist with any questions or emergencies that may arise during your rental period. Additional Details Our forklifts are meticulously maintained and regularly inspected to ensure reliability and safety. Each rental comes with a comprehensive guide on the safe operation and maintenance of the equipment. We also offer training sessions for your staff to ensure they are proficient in operating the forklifts safely and efficiently. If you require any special modifications or additional equipment, please let us know in advance, and we will do our best to accommodate your requests. Frequently Asked Questions What types of forklifts do you offer for rent? We offer a wide range of forklifts including 1-2 ton, 2-5 ton, and 5-10 ton models. Whether you need electric, diesel, or LPG forklifts, we have options to meet your specific needs. What is included in the rental price? The rental price includes standard maintenance, insurance coverage, and 24/7 customer support. If you require any additional services or modifications, please let us know in advance. How do I initiate a forklift rental? To start a rental, you need to contact us with your requirements. We will provide you with a rental agreement that includes terms and conditions, and you will need to provide a security deposit, identification, and proof of address. Can I extend the rental period if needed? Yes, you can extend the rental period if your project timeline changes. Please contact us as soon as possible to discuss the new rental duration and any adjustments to the rental agreement. What happens if the forklift gets damaged? If the forklift is damaged or shows excessive wear and tear, we will assess the situation and may charge additional fees. We advise handling the equipment with care and reporting any issues immediately. Do you offer training for forklift operation? Yes, we offer training sessions for your staff to ensure they are proficient in operating the forklifts safely. Please inform us in advance if training is required so we can schedule it accordingly. pages.privacy: LiftPro - Forklift Rental and Services in India | Privacy Policy Home Prices Solutions Services Contact us Privacy Policy At LiftPro, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services. 1. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you provide when contacting us or using our services. Usage Data: We collect information about how you use our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit. Cookies: Our website uses cookies to enhance your user experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand how you interact with our site. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To Provide and Improve Our Services: We use your data to deliver and enhance our services, including responding to your inquiries and processing transactions. To Communicate with You: We may use your contact information to send you updates, newsletters, or promotional materials related to our services. To Ensure Security: We use your data to protect against fraud, unauthorized access, and other security threats. 3. How We Share Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service Providers: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services, subject to confidentiality agreements. Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or to comply with legal processes. 4. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about your data, please contact us at liftpro@gmail.com . 5. Security We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. 6. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: liftpro@gmail.com Links Home Prices Solutions Services Contact us Contacts Gat No. 357/69, Waghjai Nagar, Kharabwadi, near PAPL company, Khed taluka, Maharashtra 410501, India +919822622271 liftpro@gmail.com Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
